00002 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTIONS_LOAD_IMP_HPP

00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif

00023 // helper function templates for serialization of collections
00024 
00025 #include <cassert>
00026 #include <cstddef> // size_t
00027 #include <boost/config.hpp> // msvc 6.0 needs this for warning suppression
00028 #if defined(BOOST_NO_STDC_NAMESPACE)
00029 namespace std{ 
00030     using ::size_t; 
00031 } // namespace std
00032 #endif
00033 #include <boost/detail/workaround.hpp>
00034 
00035 #include <boost/serialization/access.hpp>
00036 #include <boost/serialization/nvp.hpp>
00037 #include <boost/serialization/detail/stack_constructor.hpp>
00038 #include <boost/serialization/collection_size_type.hpp>
00039 
00040 
00041 namespace boost{
00042 namespace serialization {
00043 namespace stl {
00044 
00046 // implementation of serialization for STL containers
00047 //
00048 
00049 // sequential container input
00050 template<class Archive, class Container>
00051 struct archive_input_seq
00052 {
00053     inline void operator()(
00054         Archive &ar, 
00055         Container &s, 
00056         const unsigned int v
00057     ){
00058         typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME Container::value_type type;
00059         detail::stack_construct<Archive, type> t(ar, v);
00060         // borland fails silently w/o full namespace
00061         ar >> boost::serialization::make_nvp("item", t.reference());
00062         s.push_back(t.reference());
00063         ar.reset_object_address(& s.back() , & t.reference());
00064     }
00065 };
00066 
00067 // map input
00068 template<class Archive, class Container>
00069 struct archive_input_map
00070 {
00071     inline void operator()(
00072         Archive &ar, 
00073         Container &s, 
00074         const unsigned int v
00075     ){
00076         typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME Container::value_type type;
00077         detail::stack_construct<Archive, type> t(ar, v);
00078         // borland fails silently w/o full namespace
00079         ar >> boost::serialization::make_nvp("item", t.reference());
00080         std::pair<BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME Container::const_iterator, bool> result = 
00081             s.insert(t.reference());
00082         // note: the following presumes that the map::value_type was NOT tracked
00083         // in the archive.  This is the usual case, but here there is no way
00084         // to determine that.  
00085         if(result.second){
00086             ar.reset_object_address(
00087                 & (result.first->second),
00088                 & t.reference().second
00089             );
00090         }
00091     }
00092 };
00093 
00094 // multimap input
00095 template<class Archive, class Container>
00096 struct archive_input_multimap
00097 {
00098     inline void operator()(
00099         Archive &ar, 
00100         Container &s, 
00101         const unsigned int v
00102     ){
00103         typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME Container::value_type type;
00104         detail::stack_construct<Archive, type> t(ar, v);
00105         // borland fails silently w/o full namespace
00106         ar >> boost::serialization::make_nvp("item", t.reference());
00107         BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME Container::const_iterator result 
00108             = s.insert(t.reference());
00109         // note: the following presumes that the map::value_type was NOT tracked
00110         // in the archive.  This is the usual case, but here there is no way
00111         // to determine that.  
00112         ar.reset_object_address(
00113             & result->second,
00114             & t.reference()
00115         );
00116     }
00117 };
00118 
00119 // set input
00120 template<class Archive, class Container>
00121 struct archive_input_set
00122 {
00123     inline void operator()(
00124         Archive &ar, 
00125         Container &s, 
00126         const unsigned int v
00127     ){
00128         typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME Container::value_type type;
00129         detail::stack_construct<Archive, type> t(ar, v);
00130         // borland fails silently w/o full namespace
00131         ar >> boost::serialization::make_nvp("item", t.reference());
00132         std::pair<BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME Container::const_iterator, bool> result = 
00133             s.insert(t.reference());
00134         if(result.second)
00135             ar.reset_object_address(& (* result.first), & t.reference());
00136     }
00137 };
00138 
00139 // multiset input
00140 template<class Archive, class Container>
00141 struct archive_input_multiset
00142 {
00143     inline void operator()(
00144         Archive &ar, 
00145         Container &s, 
00146         const unsigned int v
00147     ){
00148         typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME Container::value_type type;
00149         detail::stack_construct<Archive, type> t(ar, v);
00150         // borland fails silently w/o full namespace
00151         ar >> boost::serialization::make_nvp("item", t.reference());
00152         BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME Container::const_iterator result 
00153             = s.insert(t.reference());
00154         ar.reset_object_address(& (* result), & t.reference());
00155     }
00156 };
00157 
00158 template<class Container>
00159 class reserve_imp
00160 {
00161 public:
00162     void operator()(Container &s, std::size_t count) const {
00163         s.reserve(count);
00164     }
00165 };
00166 
00167 template<class Container>
00168 class no_reserve_imp
00169 {
00170 public:
00171     void operator()(Container & /* s */, std::size_t /* count */) const{}
00172 };
00173 
00174 template<class Archive, class Container, class InputFunction, class R>
00175 inline void load_collection(Archive & ar, Container &s)
00176 {
00177     s.clear();
00178     // retrieve number of elements
00179     collection_size_type count;
00180     unsigned int item_version;
00181     ar >> BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(count);
00182     if(3 < ar.get_library_version())
00183         ar >> BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(item_version);
00184     else
00185         item_version = 0;
00186     R rx;
00187     rx(s, count);
00188     std::size_t c = count;
00189     InputFunction ifunc;
00190     while(c-- > 0){
00191         ifunc(ar, s, item_version);
00192     }
00193 }
00194 
00195 } // namespace stl 
00196 } // namespace serialization
00197 } // namespace boost
00198 
00199 #endif //BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTIONS_LOAD_IMP_HPP
